testcase.classname: As a user I check that shopping cart is visible in all pages
testcase.name: As a use I add an item which is marked as out of stock
testcase.system-out: Given I open a page.........................................................passed When I add item into the search field.......................................passed And I move to the search page with item.....................................passed And I click on exist element................................................passed And I go to the correct page................................................passed And I click add to cart.....................................................passed And I open a cart using right menu button...................................passed And I see item marked as out of stock.......................................passed Then I see red color note that item out of stock with message " Products marked with *** are not available in the desired quantity or not in stock".passed
